mapper.select: select count(1) from user_info where to_days(create_time) = to_days (#{date} )
select count(1) from user_info where is_vip = 1 and to_days(vip_time) = to_days( #{date} )
select count(1) from user_info u1 join user_info u2 on (u1.invitees_id = u2.id and u2.invitees_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) where to_days(u1.create_time) = to_days(now())
